definition: erhua variant of 寬心丸|宽心丸[kuan1 xin1 wan2]

sentences.english: All theories of sustainable tourism are, of course, soothing.
sentences.chinese: 當然，所有可持續的旅遊理念都使人寬心。

sentences.english: The Hotel Jade offers a soothing experience of revitalising tranquility in the heart of the city!
sentences.chinese: 本酒店在這市中心內提供使人寬心的體驗。

sentences.english: Close your eyes. clear your heart. let it go.
sentences.chinese: 閉上眼，放寬心，隨它去吧。

sentences.english: The doctor said some comforting words to me and told me not to worry about the child's illness.
sentences.chinese: 醫生給我吃了寬心丸，告訴我不用擔心孩子的病情。

sentences.english: I could imagine how sorry you are, but I do want you to take it easy.
sentences.chinese: 我能想像你有多麼難過，但希望你千萬要放寬心。

sentences.english: Better by far to embrace the hard truth than a reassuring fable.
sentences.chinese: 信奉無情真理遠遠勝於一則讓人寬心的神話。

sentences.english: But commutable comparable numbers of those who received placebos also improved.
sentences.chinese: 但是相比的那些得到寬心劑的人們也改善了。

sentences.english: We can finally relax for a bit.
sentences.chinese: 我們終於可以稍微放寬心一點了。

sentences.english: May you share freely, never taking more than you give.
sentences.chinese: 願你寬心與人分享，所取不多於你所施予。

sentences.english: The kind advice rests easily on one's conscience.
He also reassured her and sent Muhammad word telling him to be reassured.
sentences.chinese: 他同樣安慰她，要她轉告穆罕默德放寬心。

sentences.english: Feel comfortable getting rid of these things.
sentences.chinese: 放寬心的丟掉這些東西吧。

fellow sufferers empathize with each other (idiom); misery loves company
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
to show off/to try to be brave
at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt/flexible/to accept circumstances with good will
